snoopy.blindnote: sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA A159 : SNORD45A SNORD45C.sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA U172 : SNORD45A SNORD45B (20100706末安)snoRNABaseを参考にsequenceを3'側から1nt,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss-Laszlo, Z., Henry, Y., Bachellerie, J. P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1996). Site-specific ribose methylation of preribosomal RNA: a novel function for small nucleolar RNAs. Cell, 85, 1077-1088.
